item.title: What Happens When we Sleep?
item.description: We are all familiar to some degree that the housekeeping of our bodies occurs during sleep, that our bodies restore balance, filter toxins and our brains rewire and organise the inputs that weâ€™ve fed into it during our wakeful state.

item.title: Reach out
item.description: I’m always open to hearing from you. Reach out to me using any of the information on this page or through my social media handles
